headline: Needham Downgrades Lululemon Athletica Inc. (LULU) to Hold
summary: Lululemon Athletica Inc. (NASDAQ:LULU) is one of the 12 Best Widow and Orphan Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On September 25, Needham downgraded Lululemon Athletica Inc. (NASDAQ:LULU) to Hold, warning that growing challenges were offsetting its strong brand and 59.1% gross margins. After remaining unchanged in Q4 2024, North American comparable sales dropped 1% […]
